website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for its 800+ photographs and illustrations, but it may be a little too technical for some.
pros: Good textual explanations, as well as over 800 photographs and illustrations
Features quick-reference checklists to aid in identification, and a section on how to build your own collection
cons: Some found this guide to be a little too complex, so it may not be the best guide for complete beginners

customer_reviews.title: Best Rock Lover Resource!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large book for budding geologists and rock hounders alike. I have a hard time understanding how different rocks form and geologic terminology in general, and this was by far the easiest book to understand without making me feel like a 4 year old. Simple and consise explanations and an abundance of pictures, make this a great resource.
customer_reviews.author: KLD2003

customer_reviews.title: Rock hound guide
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book for my 11 year old grandson, who also loves rocks and minerals. He reads it everyday after school and shared it at school
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: The best book to read if you want to learn all there is to know about rocks and minerals.
customer_reviews.text: For the aspiring rockhound. My son read each and every word and is a wealth of knowledge now! Excellent gift or read it to learn if you have a yearning to know about all things rocks and minerals. Great book!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent resource
customer_reviews.text: If you love geology or are a rock hound this an excellent and very helpful guide. Beautifully illustrated with photos and information. Very nice and complete book.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Cool book ugly cover.
customer_reviews.text: I like the info the book provides but the cover is ugly and my book was warped and tightly bound, but it does have lots of info and photos which is just what I was looking for. It looks like something you’d find at the back of a TJ Max store.
customer_reviews.author: spaghettiMonster

customer_reviews.title: Not just a list
customer_reviews.text: Illustrates how types of rock’s form, and details different kinds. Exactly what I was looking for. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tori Childs

customer_reviews.title: One of the best I've found on the subject
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This book is so beautiful and informative! I love how it breaks down large categories into smaller ones that greatly help to identify your rocks and minerals. It gives a lot of RELEVANT information in a digestible way.
customer_reviews.author: dezepher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great Book for my grandson. Bought to go with the rock tumbler
customer_reviews.author: Lisha Vecchiarelli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Describes how to do a hardness test. Explains the chemistry composition. Vibrany pictures
customer_reviews.author: Mimzie

customer_reviews.title: Very Detailed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for general or in depth knowledge of rocks and minerals. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Trace S.

customer_reviews.title: It was a hitd
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew. Hes 8. He loved it. His parents did too. Now they are anxiously awaiting Spring to go play rockhounds.
customer_reviews.author: debby

customer_reviews.title: That it came quickly
customer_reviews.text: It's good. Was looking for more simple rocks. But all the books I found had the same information
customer_reviews.author: diane banks

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful and teaches alot about each one but I wish there were more pictures of digs
customer_reviews.author: kaitie

customer_reviews.title: Best rock and mineral reference book.
customer_reviews.text: Best rock and mineral reference book I own. I use it constantly. Great photos and descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Barton Bollfrass

customer_reviews.title: Fun education
customer_reviews.text: This book is very nice and easy to read. It's educational but not boring. Very nice photos.
customer_reviews.author: valerie barnett

customer_reviews.title: A good pick!
customer_reviews.text: This will be an awesome Christmas gift. We were looking for something that will help a family member identify and classify rocks- as well as learn more about them. It is interesting, educational, and well structured; we are happy with this book and it seems to be the best we’ve looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Hans and Kali

product_meta.title: The Illustrated Guide to Rocks & Minerals: How to Find, Identify and Collect the World’s Most Fascinating Specimens, with Over 800 Detailed Photographs and Illustrations
